thread.title: DeSimone Captures Big Nanoscience Prize (North Carolina State University)
thread.title_full: DeSimone Captures Big Nanoscience Prize (North Carolina State University) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: DeSimone Captures Big Nanoscience Prize (North Carolina State University)
text: ( Source : North Carolina State University ) Joseph DeSimone , William R. Kenan Jr. Distinguished Professor of Chemical and Biomolecular Engineering at NC State , has received the inaugural $ 250,000 Kabiller Prize in Nanoscience and Nanomedicine
